services.name: Energy Resource Optimization Service
services.description: This service provides tools for optimizing energy production and distribution strategies by analyzing resource availability, operational efficiency, and market demand.

services.name: Renewable Energy Integration Service
services.description: Facilitates the incorporation of renewable energy sources, such as solar and wind, into existing energy grids through comprehensive data analytics and system simulations.

services.name: Energy Consumption Analysis Service
services.description: Enables consumers and businesses to monitor and analyze their energy consumption patterns, identify inefficiencies, and recommend actionable improvements.

services.name: Energy Equipment Maintenance Scheduler
services.description: Supports enterprises in scheduling and managing maintenance activities for energy sector equipment to ensure operational reliability and reduce downtime.

services.name: Carbon Emission Tracking Service
services.description: Offers capabilities to monitor and report carbon emissions across production and supply chains, assisting organizations in achieving environmental and compliance objectives.
